sentences.en: I couldn't believe these people were behaving in this way.
sentences.cn: 我无法相信这些人竟这样行事。

sentences.en: I would never have expected her to behave in such an underhand way.
sentences.cn: 我从未想到她的行为竟如此阴险。

sentences.en: If you don't behave yourselves I'll box your ears!
sentences.cn: 你们若不规矩,我会打你们耳光的!

sentences.en: It is shocking that humans can behave with such bestiality towards others.
sentences.cn: 令人震惊的是，人竟然能对同类下此毒手。

sentences.en: It's incredible that Peter can behave with such stupid lack of feeling.
sentences.cn: 彼得行事如此麻木不仁，真是难以置信。

sentences.en: It's surely overstepping the mark to behave so rudely to your guests.
sentences.cn: 你对客人如此粗鲁真是太过分了.

sentences.en: Mr Blake was a gent. He knew how to behave.
sentences.cn: 布莱克先生是位绅士，举止得体。

sentences.en: Quantum mechanics is the study of the way atoms behave.
sentences.cn: 量子力学是研究原子运动的学科。

sentences.en: She behaved in a very responsible way .
The aim of discipline is to teach children to behave acceptably.
sentences.cn: 纪律的目的是教育儿童举止得体。

sentences.en: They behave with a total lack of inhibition.
They were expected to behave themselves.
Under certain conditions, electrons can behave like waves rather than particles.
sentences.cn: 在一定条件下，电子可以作波状运动，而不是粒子状运动。

sentences.en: What else could make him behave so out of character?
sentences.cn: 还有什么能让他做出这种如此失常的行为来？

sentences.en: When trouble comes they behave selfishly and horribly.
sentences.cn: 遇到麻烦时，他们表现得很自私，很差劲。

sentences.en: You are asking for trouble when you behave in that way.
sentences.cn: 你那种行为是自找苦吃.

trans.tran_cn: 表现，举止得体，作出反应
trans.tran_en: to do things that are good, bad, sensible etc

trans.tran_cn: 行为；开动，运转；作出反应
trans.tran_en: if something behaves in a particular way, it does those things
